description:
Join forces with your friend in the ultimate cooking adventure with this new Multiplayer Mode! 

This DLC for Pizza Bar Tycoon features an exciting local multiplayer gameplay mode, allowing players to team up and play together. It adds a new layer of excitement and replayability to the game, while providing a fun and engaging experience for players to enjoy with friends and family. 

NOTE: to play the Multiplayer Mode DLC, each player will need their own set of Joy-Con™ or an additional Nintendo Switch™ Pro Controller.
name: Cooking Tycoons: 3 in 1 Bundle - Pizza Bar Tycoon Multiplayer Mode
